question_text: Which scenario best describes a 'temporary software problem' that might cause a system freeze?
answer_options: System freeze during antivirus full scan that resolves after reboot
Repeated crash at POST every time the system powers on
BSOD during startup linked to faulty RAM
Black screen with no signal when GPU is unplugged
correct_answer: System freeze during antivirus full scan that resolves after reboot
explanation: Some system freezes are due to temporary software hangs or overloaded processes, not hardware failure.
